reference:
The sample represents only courses where textbooks were listed online
through UCLA Bookstore's website. The most expensive textbook was selected
based on the UCLA Bookstore price, which may insert bias into the data; for
this reason, it may be beneficial to analyze only the data where more
is "N".
title: Textbook data for UCLA Bookstore and Amazon
description:
Description
A random sample was taken of nearly 10\
textbook for each course was identified, and its new price at the UCLA
Bookstore and on Amazon.com were recorded.

parameters.ucla_new: New price at the UCLA Bookstore.
parameters.diff: The UCLA Bookstore price minus the Amazon.com price for each book.
parameters.more: Whether additional books were required for the course (Y means "yes, additional books were required").

format: A data frame with 73 observations on the following 7 variables.
